wikipedia_page.main: William Clarke (fl. 1897–1900), also known as Billy Clark, was a professional footballer who made 35 appearances in the Football League for Lincoln City in the late 1890s. Before joining Lincoln, he spent a season with Aberdeen, a predecessor of the modern Aberdeen F.C. He played mainly as an inside left.
